OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Service.label: Service (temp. disabled)
Service.tooltip:
Service used. This will change the shoutout links to the current service.
OBS: Temporarily disabled

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

CasterCD.label: Caster ignores cooldown
CasterCD.tooltip: If enabled the caster ignore cooldowns!

BaseResponse.value: /me go give these guys a follow <3
BaseResponse.label: Base response with roll
BaseResponse.tooltip: First part of the shoutout, before seperator or links

Seperator.label: Line reset
Seperator.tooltip: Use line reset between base response and first link!

EndSeperator.label: End line
EndSeperator.tooltip: Use line after the last link to close off the command

Extended.label: Extended seperators
Extended.tooltip: Extended seperators to fit the new twitch default font

Thick.label: Thick seperators
Thick.tooltip: Use thicker seperators instead of the default ones

Emotes.label: Emotes
Emotes.tooltip: The three emotes behind each link

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
